ValidationRule.description: if campaign type <> 'Local Exclusive', the Campaign 9 digits must be entered and must be 9 digits
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Contains(RecordType.Name, 'Master Campaign'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(RTL_Campaign_Type__c, 'Local Exclusive')), LEN(RTL_Campaign_Code_9_digits__c ) <> 9)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Campaign code 9 digits must be entered and must be only 9 digits.
